remarks: Betweenness implies less-than relation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jul-2019.)
statement:
legval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
legval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
legval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
legval.l $e |- .<_ = ( leG ` G ) $.
legval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
legid.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
legid.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
legtrd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
btwnleg.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I C ) ) $.
btwnleg $p |- ( ph -> ( A .- B ) .<_ ( A .- C ) ) $.
